languages.text: "Многочисленные потери среди боевых и гражданских единиц" — это мертвые люди, магос? Они толпами мрут везде, всегда, при любом командовании. Если всех считать начнешь, то когитатор в черепушке и перегреться может!"

traits.locale_text: "Многочисленные потери среди боевых и гражданских единиц" — это мертвые люди, магос. Они толпами мрут везде, всегда, при любом командовании. Ты поосторожнее — если всех считать начнешь, то твой когитатор в черепушке и перегреться может!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"
languages.original_text: "Многочисленные потери среди боевых и гражданских единиц" — это мертвые люди, магос? Они толпами мрут везде, всегда, при любом командовании. Если всех считать начнешь, то когитатор в черепушке и перегреться может!"

traits.locale_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “战斗单位与平民单位的惨重损失——你指的是死人吗，贤者？那些人被各种各样的人指挥，随时随地、每时每刻都在成群结队地丧命。如果你真的打算把所有死人都清点一遍，恐怕你脑子里的沉思者就要烧坏了！”
languages.original_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"

traits.locale_text: “战斗单位与平民单位的惨重损失——你指的是死人吗，贤者？那些人被各种各样的人指挥，随时随地、每时每刻都在成群结队地丧命。如果你真的打算把所有死人都清点一遍，恐怕你脑子里的思考器就要烧坏了！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Un gran número de pérdidas entre las unidades civiles y de combate... ¿quieres decir personas fallecidas, magos? La gente muere a cientos en todas partes, a cada minuto, bajo todo tipo de liderazgos. ¡Si intentaras contar a todos los muertos, freirías el cogitador que llevas en el cráneo!».
languages.original_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"

traits.locale_text: «Un gran número de pérdidas entre las unidades civiles y de combate... ¿quieres decir personas fallecidas, magos? La gente muere a cientos en todas partes, a cada minuto, bajo todo tipo de liderazgos. ¡Si intentaras contar a todos los muertos, freirías el cogitador que llevas en el cráneo!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「戦闘員と市民の多数の損失とは、死んだ人のことかしら、マゴス？あらゆる場所で、刻一刻と、あらゆる種類の指導者のもとで、人々は死んでいっているのよ。もしすべてを数えようとするなら、あなたの考算機は焼け焦げてしまうかもしれないわね！」
languages.original_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"

traits.locale_text: 「戦闘員と市民の多数の損失とは、死んだ人のことかしら、マゴス？あらゆる場所で、刻一刻と、あらゆる種類の指導者のもとで、人々は死んでいっているのよ。もしすべてを数えようとするなら、あなたの考算機は焼け焦げてしまうかもしれないわね！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Zahlreiche Verluste unter kämpfenden und zivilen Einheiten ... meint Ihr damit Tote, Magos? Es sterben überall und in jeder Minute Trauben von Leuten, unabhängig von der Führung. Würdet Ihr versuchen, sie alle zu zählen, würdet Ihr den Cogitator in Eurem Schädel rösten!"
languages.original_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"

traits.locale_text: "Zahlreiche Verluste unter kämpfenden und zivilen Einheiten ... meint Ihr damit Tote, Magos? Es sterben überall und in jeder Minute Trauben von Leuten, unabhängig von der Führung. Würdet Ihr versuchen, sie alle zu zählen, würdet Ihr den Cogitator in Eurem Schädel rösten!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « J'enregistre des pertes importantes parmi les unités de civils et de combattants... Vous voulez dire des morts, magos ? Des milliers de gens meurent chaque seconde, et ce, quel que soit leur dirigeant. Votre cogitateur grillerait si vous deviez tous les compter ! »
languages.original_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"

traits.locale_text: « J'enregistre des pertes importantes parmi les unités de civils et de combattants... Vous voulez dire des morts, magos ? Des milliers de gens meurent chaque seconde, et ce, quel que soit leur dirigeant. Votre cogitateur grillerait si vous deviez tous les compter ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Birimler arasında büyük zayiat derken ölü insanları mı kastediyorsun Magos? İnsanlar sürüler hâlinde ölüyor. Her yerde, her dakika, her türden liderlik altında. Sayma işine kendini çok kaptırma, kafandaki kavramsayarı yakarsın!"
languages.original_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Numerous losses among combat and civilian units — do you mean dead people, Magos? People die in droves everywhere, every minute, under all kinds of leadership. If you tried to count them all, you might fry the cogitator in your skull!"
